data.eml:eml: Annotated Checklist of Tingidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) in Turkey with new records for the faunas of Europe and Turkish Thrace

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dursun, Ahmet, Fent, Meral (2017): Annotated Checklist of Tingidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) in Turkey with new records for the faunas of Europe and Turkish Thrace. Zootaxa 4347 (3): 465-491, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4347.3.3
